programme.title: A Very Merry Mix-Up
programme.desc: A woman plans to meet her future in-laws at Christmas and, through a serendipitous series of events, spends the holiday with a warm and caring family whose son catches her eye.

programme.title: Miracle in Bethlehem, PA
programme.desc: A single woman with a newly adopted baby gets stuck in Bethlehem, Pa.; with no room at the inn, she's forced to stay with a stranger who turns out to be the miracle she has needed.

programme.title: Christmas Above the Clouds
programme.desc: Eager to avoid Christmas, Ella Neezer, a CEO, books an international trip that skips the holiday, until three spirits journey Ella through her life to rediscover her Christmas spirit.

programme.title: A Little Christmas Charm
programme.desc: A jewelry designer teams up with an investigative reporter to find the owner of a charm bracelet before Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Christmas Under Wraps
programme.desc: After unexpectedly moving to Alaska, an ambitious doctor starts a new romance and learns that her small town is hiding a holiday secret.

programme.title: Holiday Touchdown: A Chiefs Love Story
programme.desc: Chiefs superfan Alana tries to win the Fan of the Year Award as a Christmas gift for her family, falling in love with someone in the Chiefs front office along the way.

programme.title: The Christmas Train
programme.desc: A cynical journalist must get from Washington, D.C., to Los Angeles in time for Christmas, and his only option is to take the train.

programme.title: Holiday Touchdown: A Bills Love Story
programme.desc: Sparks fly between two lifelong Buffalo Bills fans as they try to discover the identity of a mysterious Christmastime gift giver.

programme.title: A Royal Montana Christmas
programme.desc: Overwhelmed by her royal duties, Princess Victoria visits Big Sky Country for Christmas and meets her dashing guide at the ranch. She must decide if love is worth leaving her royal life behind.

programme.title: A Grand Ole Opry Christmas
programme.desc: When Gentry returns to the iconic Grand Ole Opry, a magical twist of fate sends her back in time to discover love and hope.

programme.title: Haul Out the Holly
programme.desc: Emily comes home to visit her parents, only to discover they're leaving for a trip of their own. While staying at their house for the holidays, Emily meets members of the community who want her to join in the neighborhood's Christmas festivities.

programme.title: Three Wisest Men
programme.desc: As life pushes their family in different directions, the Brenner boys decide they need to put on the best Christmas ever to bring everyone back together.

programme.title: Santa Tell Me
programme.desc: A design show host finds a letter from Santa promising to meet her true love, a man named Nick, by Christmas Eve. Meeting three Nicks complicates her search.

programme.title: A Suite Holiday Romance
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a struggling writer and a British tourist as they spend Christmas week in New York City's Grand Fairbanks Hotel.

programme.title: Twelve Dates 'Til Christmas
programme.desc: Kate has difficult decisions to make and turns to Delilah for help; despite Laura's commitment to not meddle, she wants to make things right for Callum and Kate.

programme.title: Twelve Dates 'Til Christmas
programme.desc: As the twelfth date draws near, Kate is feeling confident in her choices; when new information comes to light, she can no longer deny her true feelings.

programme.title: Single on the 25th
programme.desc: For Nell Duke, nothing is worse than being single during Christmastime as everywhere she looks, couples are kissing under the mistletoe. However, she soon makes a special connection with a neighbor who shows her how to keep the holidays festive.

programme.title: A Christmas Carousel
programme.desc: Lila is hired by the royal family of Ancadia to repair a carousel and must work with the prince to complete it by Christmas.

programme.title: Once Upon a Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: Told she would have less than a few months to live without a new liver, Heather's time was running out when a kind stranger heard of her plight and discovered he was a perfect match. The two met and before long a friendship developed into romance.

programme.title: Silver Bells
programme.desc: A teenage runaway (Michael Mitchell) connects his widowed father (Tate Donovan) and a woman (Anne Heche) who lost her husband during a past Christmas holiday.

programme.title: One Starry Christmas
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a woman (Sarah Carter) and her bus companion (Damon Runyan) after her boyfriend (Paul Popowich) leaves her alone during Christmastime.

programme.title: Christmas Tree Lane
programme.desc: When music store owner Meg spearheads community efforts to save her street from demolition, she is shocked to find out that the man she's falling for is working for the company that she is fighting.

programme.title: An Alpine Holiday
programme.desc: Two vastly different sisters follow their late grandparent's steps and experience everything the Alps has to offer, including romance.

programme.title: Tidings for the Season
programme.desc: News anchor Adam is challenged by superfan Robbie to report good news at Christmas. Adam reluctantly takes him under his wing and finds a connection with Robbie's mom.

programme.title: All I Need for Christmas
programme.desc: Looking for inspiration, singer-songwriter Maggie travels home and finds a spark with app developer Archer, who is trying to repair his relationship with his sister.

programme.title: A Make or Break Holiday
programme.desc: A couple decide they need a break from each other as stress and unspoken irritations reach a boiling point. However, as they work together to create a memorable Christmas for their families, they soon rediscover what they love about each other.

programme.title: Oy to the World!
programme.desc: Old high school rivals must put aside their differences as they work together on a fundraising event for a damaged temple. In doing so, they soon discover that teamwork can move mountains and open hearts, including their own.

programme.title: Return to Christmas Creek
programme.desc: After being told her new holiday app lacked Christmas spirit, a young CEO returns to her hometown to rediscover the meaning of the holidays.

programme.title: Reunited at Christmas
programme.desc: As a child, Samantha spent every Christmas at her beloved Nana's house building the traditions of fun and joy with her family. Sam is facing the first Christmas without Nana and still struggling to find the Christmas spirit when she gets a surprise.

programme.title: Christmas Land
programme.desc: After inheriting a Christmas tree farm, a woman's plans to sell it change when she falls in love with the townspeople and meets a charming lawyer named Tucker.

programme.title: Five More Minutes
programme.desc: Inspired by Scotty McCreery's song "Five More Minutes," a woman's Christmas wish is answered in unexpected ways when her late grandfather's journal turns up and reveals an untold romance.

programme.title: Christmas in Montana
programme.desc: An efficiency expert goes to Montana before the holidays and attempts to help a man save his ranch.

programme.title: The Christmas Ornament
programme.desc: Kathy plans to avoid any holiday traditions that bring back memories of her late husband until she receives an ornament from a handsome shop owner. To move on from her loss, Kathy works for a balance between her memories and finding a future.

programme.title: November Christmas
programme.desc: A community works together to help a couple bring an early Christmas to their sick 8-year-old daughter (Emily Alyn Lind).

programme.title: Christmas at Dollywood
programme.desc: When a NYC event planner returns to Tennessee to organize the Christmas celebration at Dollywood, she's paired with the head of operations who thinks he can handle the party just fine on his own.

programme.title: A Season for Miracles
programme.desc: A woman (Carla Gugino) tries to save her sister's (Laura Dern) children from foster care by taking them to a small town where she is mistaken for a missing heiress.

programme.title: A Christmas Tree Grows in Colorado
programme.desc: A woman who is in charge of her town's Christmas celebration must win over a firefighter to obtain a magnificent spruce tree from his property for the festivities.

programme.title: Christmas Festival of Ice
programme.desc: Emma is determined to keep her hometown's Christmas ice-sculpting contest going. She enlists sponsors and artists, but Nick, the town's ace artisan, isn't interested in competing until he sees what Emma has accomplished.

programme.title: Making Spirits Bright
programme.desc: A man and a woman from rival families try to mend their respective fathers' decades-old feud. They soon find romance along the way as they compete in a holiday decorating contest.

programme.title: A Bride for Christmas
programme.desc: Aiden (Andrew Walker) bets his friends that he can convince a woman to marry him by Christmas, and he sets his sights on Jessie (Arielle Kebbel), a young woman who has sworn off serious relationships.

programme.title: My Christmas Family Tree
programme.desc: A woman meets long-lost relatives for the first time after discovering her family tree during the holidays.

programme.title: Angel Falls: A Novel Holiday
programme.desc: Book editor Hannah must work with former rival Ryan to help a potential writer find her way, and Angel Anthony reminds them about Christmas spirit and the value of community.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas
programme.desc: As Christmas approaches, Paula reluctantly accepts a marriage proposal from her boyfriend. When her Aunt Jane invites Paula to her Nantucket home, she bonds with a charming inn owner.

programme.title: Check Inn to Christmas
programme.desc: Julia Crawley and Ryan Mason must unite their families during Crestridge's Centennial Christmas celebration to save their family inns from a chain resort.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's Joyful Mrs. Miracle
programme.desc: Mrs. Miracle uses Christmas magic to reunite three siblings who must decide who will inherit the family's real estate empire, following their grandmother's passing.

programme.title: A December Bride
programme.desc: Layla accompanies Seth to her cousin's wedding, and everyone is surprised when she announces they're engaged. They are forced to keep up the pretense, and as they spend more time together, they find themselves feeling something very real.

programme.title: A Heidelberg Holiday
programme.desc: Heidi Heidelberg receives a dream opportunity to sell her beautiful, handmade glass ornaments at the prestigious Heidelberg Christmas Market in Germany. While there, she meets Lukas, a local artisan who helps her reconnect with her lost heritage.

programme.title: Trading Up Christmas
programme.desc: Michelle tries to get her sister a new place to live and all she has is a Christmas stocking to trade with.

programme.title: When I Think of Christmas
programme.desc: Sara reunites with her ex-boyfriend, Josh, when she returns to her hometown to help her mother move. When Sara makes a surprising discovery, she and Josh forge a bold plan for an upcoming Christmas concert that takes them back to their musical roots.

programme.title: Christmas at Holly Lodge
programme.desc: Sophie Bennett, the owner of the Holly Lodge, tries to convince a developer that the lodge is actually a bad investment.

programme.title: Open by Christmas
programme.desc: When Nicky finds an unopened Christmas card from an old secret admirer, she and her best friend embark on a quest to find the anonymous author.

programme.title: This Time Each Year
programme.desc: Despite a trial separation, Lauren pretends to still be with her husband, Kevin, to placate her overbearing mother. The ruse may be just what the couple needs to finally work on their marriage.

programme.title: Murder, She Baked
programme.desc: Hannah Swensen has her hands full with two romantic suitors, her baking business, a murdered customer, and the case to find her customer's killer.

programme.title: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
programme.desc: Sean Anderson partners with his mom's husband on a mission to find his grandfather, who is thought to be missing on a mythical island.

programme.title: Red One
programme.desc: When a villain kidnaps Santa Claus from the North Pole, an E.L.F. (Extremely Large and Formidable) operative joins forces with the world's most accomplished tracker to find him and save Christmas.

programme.title: Red One
programme.desc: When a villain kidnaps Santa Claus from the North Pole, an E.L.F. (Extremely Large and Formidable) operative joins forces with the world's most accomplished tracker to find him and save Christmas.

programme.title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
programme.desc: A science professor (Brendan Fraser) and his nephew (Josh Hutcherson) encounter strange creatures and stranger lands as they travel beneath the Earth's surface.

programme.title: Anna and the Apocalypse
programme.desc: When the zombie apocalypse hits the sleepy town of Little Haven, at Christmas, teenager Anna and her high school friends have to fight, sing and dance to survive, with the undead horde all around them.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A con man convinces the inhabitants of a Western town that he can raise the dead from the local cemetery.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The morning after a wild party, a couple wakes up in a totally unfamiliar and artificial place.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Three astronauts land on a strange planet and meet its caretaker.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An astronaut (Roddy McDowall) experiences martian hospitality.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Old Ben has the strange power to change himself into anything, or anyone, he wants.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A space traveler terrorizes the tiny inhabitants of a space station into accepting him as their God, but when another space ship arrives the tyrannical man discovers everything is relative.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Mr. Frisby impresses quite a few people with his vivid imagination.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An astronaut (Richard Basehart) learns war has killed his people.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An astronaut returns from a 30-year mission to find that his girlfriend hasn't aged at all.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Tough aliens from outer space try to poison the population of earth.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Two people in a remote cabin find signs of an alien.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An astronaut (Steve Forrest) arrives in a world much like his own -- except for a few small differences. With Frank Aletter.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A man considers several possibilities when he is offered one wish by a genie in a magic lamp. With Jack Albertson.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.sub-title: On Thursday We Leave for Home
programme.desc: The leader (James Whitmore) of a colony stranded on an asteroid resists rescue. With James Broderick.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A would-be writer (Jack Weston) summons William Shakespeare to help him write a teleplay. With John McGiver, Burt Reynolds.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.sub-title: Of Late I Think of Cliffordville
programme.desc: A wealthy businessman (Albert Salmi) strikes a deal with Satan and relives his past. With Julie Newmar, John Anderson.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.sub-title: The Incredible World of Horace Ford
programme.desc: A toy designer (Pat Hingle) visits his old neighborhood and finds it exactly as it was in his childhood.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.sub-title: An Occurrence at Owl Creek Bridge
programme.desc: Ambrose Bierce relates the tale of a Confederate soldier's execution at the end of the Civil War.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A woman hopes a trans-Atlantic cruise and holiday in London will help save her marriage.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A young boy keeps in touch with his dead grandmother via the toy telephone she once gave him.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A small-time hoodlum gets killed by the police during a robbery and finds an afterlife where he can have anything he wants.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A drunken department-store Santa (Art Carney) finds a magic bag of gifts.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.sub-title: Five Characters in Search of an Exit
programme.desc: Five people - a ballet dancer, a major, a clown, a tramp and a bagpipe player - trapped in a featureless enclosure with no idea how they got there attempt to escape.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Apparently benign alien emissaries show mankind how to end the misery of war, plague and famine.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A man recovering from a nervous breakdown sees a horrifying creature on the wing of his plane. With William Shatner.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A woman's natural beauty makes her a freak in a futuristic society.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A woman battles two miniature aliens from another planet in a battle of size vs. scientific weapons. With Agnes Moorehead.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.sub-title: Will the Real Martian Please Stand Up
programme.desc: On the night of a UFO sighting, seven people at a diner claim to be of Earth, though one of them is not.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Unique circumstances allow a meek bank teller to indulge his passion for reading. With Burgess Meredith.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.sub-title: The Monsters Are Due on Maple Street
programme.desc: A mysterious power failure causes paranoid suburban residents to suspect one another of being disguised creatures from outer space.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A man's ambition to be the best pool shark on Chicago's Randolph Street carries a high cost. With Jonathan Winters, Jack Klugman.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A ventriloquist becomes convinced that his dummy has a will and a life of its own.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A power-hungry American Nazi (Dennis Hopper) receives advice from a mysterious benefactor. With Paul Mazursky.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A man (John McGiver) who enjoys loud noises is driven crazy when trivial sounds become deafening to him.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A shy man becomes obsessed with a tiny doll that's inanimate to everyone but him. With Robert Duvall.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A desperate newspaper editor hires the devil (Burgess Meredith) to save his failing business. With Patricia Crowley.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An assassin plots a unique death for a defector (Martin Landau).

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A World War II veteran and a Japanese-American gardener battle each other over a war that ended more than 20 years ago.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A man (Dana Andrews) travels backward in time and tries to change events surrounding Hiroshima, Hitler and the Lusitania.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A wax-museum employee (Martin Balsam) moves the figures of several notorious murderers into the basement of his home.

programme.title: Escape Room
programme.desc: Six strangers visit a mysterious building to experience the escape room: a game where players compete to solve a series of puzzles. Terror strikes when they soon learn each room is an elaborate trap that's part of a sadistic game of life or death.

programme.title: Escape Room: Tournament of Champions
programme.desc: Six people unwittingly find themselves locked in another series of escape rooms, slowly uncovering what they have in common to survive -- and discovering they've all played the game before.

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: On the run from a Detroit crime boss, an ex-con and his adopted brother use a high-tech gun to battle an army of thugs and two heavily armored, futuristic soldiers who want their weapon back.

programme.title: Knock at the Cabin
programme.desc: While vacationing at a remote cabin, a young girl and her parents are taken hostage by four armed strangers who demand that the family make an unthinkable choice to avert the apocalypse.

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine 2
programme.desc: The magical hot tub sends Lou (Rob Corddry), Nick (Craig Robinson) and Jacob (Clark Duke) to the year 2025 to prevent an unknown assailant from shooting Lou.

programme.title: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure

programme.title: Fudbal - Afrički kup nacija: Algeria - Sudan
programme.desc: Afrički kup nacija je popularno fudbalsko takmičenje za najbolje fudbalske reprezentacija afričkog kontinenta. Svake dve godine pred očima celog sveta dobija se novi kralj Afrike.

programme.title: Rukomet - Nemačka liga: Magdeburg - Kiel
programme.desc: Rukometna Bundesliga je najviši rang takmičenja u Nemačkoj. Kvalitetom igre smatra se jednim od najkvalitetnijih rukometnih liga na svetu.

programme.title: Košarka - Euroleague: Bayern - Hapoel Tel Aviv
programme.desc: Najjače klupsko takmičenje u košarci na području Evrope svake sezone privlači pažnju velikog broja zaljubljenika košarku. Kao takmičenje visokog kvaliteta verujemo da će privući vašu pažnju.

programme.title: Odbojka - Slovenački kup: 1/4 Finale: Calcit Kamnik - Volley Ljubljana
programme.desc: Malo ranije nego obično, u Sloveniji se deli prvi trofej. A, uvek je dobro nastaviti sezonu znajući da već imate jedan pehar.

programme.title: NCAA američki nogomet - Frisco Bowl: Ohio - UNLV
programme.desc: Koledž fudbal je američki fudbal koji igraju timovi sportista-studenata u okviru američkih koledža, univerziteta i vojnih akademija. Univerzitetski fudbal je jedna stepenica niže u odnosu na...

programme.title: Fudbal - Afrički kup nacija: Ivory Coast - Mozambique
programme.desc: Afrički kup nacija je popularno fudbalsko takmičenje za najbolje fudbalske reprezentacija afričkog kontinenta. Svake dve godine pred očima celog sveta dobija se novi kralj Afrike.

programme.title: Košarka - Izraelska liga: Herzliya - Holon
programme.desc: Superliga Izraela u košarci je najviši rang košarkaških takmičenja u Izraelu. Liga je osnovana 1954. godine i trenutno broji 12 klubova.

programme.title: Pregled španske košarke
programme.desc: Donosimo pregled mečeva i klipove najboljih trenutaka iz Endese, najjače košarkaške lige Španije.

programme.title: Fudbal - Afrički kup nacija: Cameroon - Gabon
programme.desc: Afrički kup nacija je popularno fudbalsko takmičenje za najbolje fudbalske reprezentacija afričkog kontinenta. Svake dve godine pred očima celog sveta dobija se novi kralj Afrike.

programme.title: Košarka - Australijska liga: Sydney - Illawarra
programme.desc: Nema boljeg načina da se počne dan nego uz australijsku košarku. Uzeli su medalju na Olimpijskim igrama, hale su pune i napreduju iz godine u godinu.

programme.title: Fudbal: Turska liga - Pregled
programme.desc: Pogledajte najbolje momente sa utakmica Turske lige, takmičenja osnovanog 1958. godine u kom je najviše titula osvajala ekipa Galatasaraja.

programme.title: Moto GP - Pregled sezone GP
programme.desc: Za nama je još jedna uzbudljiva sezona Moto GP, Moto 2 i Moto 3 trka! Prisetite se uzbudljivih nadmetanja, velikih preokreta i poteza vozača koji su publiku ostavili bez daha.

programme.title: Fudbal - Portugalska liga: Alverca - Porto
programme.desc: Prvi liga portugalskog fudbala, Primeira liga, osnovana je 1934. i broji 18 klubova. Najviše osvojenih titula prvaka ima lisabonski gigant Benfika.

programme.title: SK STUDIO: First Down
programme.desc: Pre i posle svih važnih događaja koje prenosi Sport Klub, naši stručnjaci će vam dati sve neophodne informacije. Nećete ostati uskraćeni ni za jedan zanimljiv detalj o najvažnijim sportskim događajima...
